Rule to Enact: If any Underwriting Question is left unanswered…
Error or Warning Message to Display:
Some or all underwriting questions have not been answered or have outstanding issues and are required. 

Review all answers to UW questions. Once questions are verified, select Save or navigate to another screen. (highlight missed questions in red)

Rule to Enact: For "Bodily Injury", "Property Damage" must be included (and vice versa).
Error or Warning Message to Display:
For Bodily Injury, Property Damage must be included.
Vehicle 'Vehicle Number' - For Property Damage, Bodily Injury must be included.

Rule to Enact: If any required Driver Employment Details are left unanswered…
Error or Warning Message to Display: Employment details are required for Driver.

Rule to Enact: If the Named Insured is listed as Married then one Driver or Non-driver must be listed as Husband or Wife or Spouse.
Error or Warning Message to Display: A married insured is required to list their spouse.
Run in Quote, Application?: Quote, Application, Endorsement, Renewal Start, Renewal Change

Rule to Enact:
If any name field contains the following special character(s), trigger error:

/
<
>
Error or Warning Message to Display: Name cannot contain <special character>. Please remove <special character> to continue.

Rule to Enact:
If Producer States List License Expiration Date is EXPIRED, trigger error
Do NOT trigger error for UW Manager role
Error or Warning Message to Display: ALERT - Your Producer License has expired. Please contact the Marketing Department.

Rule to Enact: If a form is a fill-in form and has required info that has not been entered
Error or Warning Message to Display: Required Data on Form $form.gets('Name').

Rule to Enact: A "Producer Code" is required
Error or Warning Message to Display: Producer Code is required.

Rule to Enact: If a "Sub Producer" is entered, it must be a valid "Producer Code"
Error or Warning Message to Display: The 'Sub Producer' code entered does not correspond to a valid Sub Producer.

Rule to Enact: If SR22 = Yes and Driver's License State does not equal TX, WI, OH, AZ, MO, WV, TN, IA, KS, AR, IN, IL error
Error or Warning Message to Display:
SR22 can only be filed for the state of Texas.

SR22 cannot be filed for the state of <Driver's License State>.
Comments/Changes:
JAO 7/27/2022 - Changed Error or Warning Message to Display to avoid listing out all states w/ SR22s.

MN 11/15/22: Need to verify and update this for all states going forward.  Some states will be acceptable and others will not.  Need to go back to prior states to update them as well.

MN 12/14/22: Jill clarified that we need to update this one state at a time (i.e. don't add IL to the rule for other states until IL is live) SJS5.23.23 PRISUAT-1584

LE 9/09/2024- Added WV to the list GW-1622
LS 01/14/2025-Removed WV.
LE 6/11/2025- Added TN  GW-3771

Error or Warning Message to Display: Non-Driver <Driver Name> has missing information. Please fill in the required fields.

Error or Warning Message to Display: “This policy was previously cancelled by <Cancel Type>. The policy cannot be reinstated or renewed. Please process a Rewrite New transaction.”

Rule to Enact:
On New Business, Rewrite New transactions only: 
If Unacceptable Driver Indicator is Yes, and "Unacceptable Driver Override (eligibility only)” is not checked, display this error message for each driver that qualifies for these conditions.
Error or Warning Message to Display: Driver # <#>:  Not eligible for this program
Unacceptable Driver/ Unacceptable Vehicl:
No impact to Unacceptable Driver Indicator
but uses the indicator as a criteria to run the rule

Error or Warning Message to Display: Policy is pending cancellation. SR22 will not be filed until policy is reinstated.

Rule to Enact: If Make Payment amount is < 85% of amount due
Error or Warning Message to Display: Payment must be more than 85% of the amount due.

Rule to Enact: If Do Not Reinstate indicator on Special Options screen = Yes AND user permissions for AllowSpecialOptionsReinstatePayment <> Yes, error and display message.
Error or Warning Message to Display: Payment cannot be accepted at this time. Please contact the Underwriting Department for additional information.

Rule to Enact: If Payment Plan is changed and the "suffix" is different in the new pay plan, display error message.  For example, if a pay plan is updated from Direct Bill 6 Pay to Automated 6 Pay, then there should be no error message.  However, if a pay plan is updated from Direct Bill 6 Pay to Automated 6 Pay Equity, then there should be an error message.
Error or Warning Message to Display: Pay Plan Changes may affect the current invoice due

Rule to Enact:
If policy status = Cancelled OR Cancel Notice AND Cancel Reason = Non-Pay Dishonored Down Payment, trigger ERROR for Producer and Insured.
DO NOT FIRE ERROR FOR POLICYCSR, UW1, UW2, UWMANAGER
Error or Warning Message to Display: Producers or Insureds are not allowed to make a payment when a policy is pending cancel or cancelled with the reason Dishonored Down Payment.

Rule to Enact: If policy status = Cancelled and Cancel Reason = Non-Payment of Premium AND current date is on or after policy expiration date AND Submit Payment is clicked, trigger pop up warning
Error or Warning Message to Display: This payment does not guarantee reinstatement or renewal of coverage. Please contact the Underwriting Department with any questions.
Comments/Changes: JAO 12/21/2023 - Add new pop-up confirmation BEFORE Submit Payment pop up - Issue #4364

Rule to Enact:
Include with Pre-Renewal Validation task:    

Using the new renewal term effective date, Send TASK if changes made in the current term include any of the following:

If any of the following is true and the Unacceptable Driver Eligibility Override is unchecked OR the Unacceptable Vehicle Override is unchecked, generate a task to the UW group to review the policy. At that point, they can decide to allow the policy to renew or follow steps for non-renewing. If they decided to do nothing the policy will follow the renewal start process as normal.
Error or Warning Message to Display: See Task worksheet

Rule to Enact: When Producer Status = Cancelled, Replaced by Producer is blank, and there is no valid License Class Code on Renewal Effective Date of the policy.
Error or Warning Message to Display: See Task worksheet

Rule to Enact: On any transaction, if user does not have authority, and they delete an infraction where source is from MVR, they will get a validation error:
Error or Warning Message to Display: Motor Vehicle Report Infractions cannot be deleted.

Rule to Enact: Always display in the closeout screen prior to Issuance
Error or Warning Message to Display: The down payment is always due at policy issuance.

Rule to Enact: Display on Closeout Screen when Premium Amount is less than the required down payment
Error or Warning Message to Display: Down payment must be at least <amount due>.

Rule to Enact: If Additional Interest Vehicle checkbox is not selected
Error or Warning Message to Display: Additional Interest must be associated with a risk.

Rule to Enact: If the Insured's Email Address on the Policy General page is blank, the Delivery Method must be "Batch."
Error or Warning Message to Display:
The Insured's email address is blank. Please either provide an email address or change the Delivery Method to Batch Mail.
Please enter a valid email address, or select Mail as the Delivery Preference."

Rule to Enact: If vehicle # greater than 1 and garaging address not the same for each vehicle.
Error or Warning Message to Display: "Vehicles must be garaged at the same location"

Rule to Enact: If policy is in CANCEL NOTICE status for Company or Insured cancel type, only UW1, UW2, UWManager should be allowed to make payment. All other users should trigger Error.
Error or Warning Message to Display: The policy is pending cancellation for <Company/Insured> Request. Unable to accept the payment. Please contact the Underwriting Department

Rule to Enact: If policy is in CANCELLED status for Company or Insured cancel type, only UW1, UW2, UWManager should be allowed to make payment. All other users should trigger Error.
Error or Warning Message to Display: The policy is cancelled for <Company/Insured> Request. Unable to accept the payment. Please contact the Underwriting Department
